title: Send Discord announcement as single message with text + image
author: Itachi-1824

gist.summary: Updates the Discord notification script to combine text and image into a single message payload.
gist.impact: Improves the formatting and reliability of automated PR announcements.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee acting as a mail carrier, placing a polaroid photo inside a letter envelope to represent the combined message format.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art of the Pollinations bee placing a small photo inside an open letter envelope. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Symbolizing unified messages. Nostalgic but beautiful.
